tutorial.speak:
To set your color scheme and logo, click on Customize Appearance.
This will take you to the Appearance settings of the B1 website builder, which also controls your stream appearance.
The stream uses the light accent color with dark text for the header... and the dark accent color with light text for the sidebar.
You can change the colors by selecting a suggested pallet, or clicking on the individual colors. You will see example pairings of your color pallet below.
Click "Save" and the color scheme of your streaming page will be updated.
To set your logo, simply click the Logo link in the Style Settings sidebar.
For Streaming, you'll need to set the light background logo. The others are for the website builder and covered in that section.
Simply click on the existing logo or the "None" link.
Then click the upload button to select your logo file. You'll want to select an image with a transparent background and 4:1 aspect ratio.
Use the cropping tool to make sure your logo is centered and click "Update".
